Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Belmont
ShortDescription: #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Belmont, Campbell, Roscoe and Western due to street blockage near Western/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Belmont, Campbell, Roscoe, then will resume their normal route on Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Western/Belmont.
